info: With this Blade, killing demons grants you a Powerful Rampage for 3 seconds which allows you to instantly kill most demons. Right click to dash forward.

With this Axe, you can Right Click to grant yourself a Powerful Rampage for 8 seconds. This ability has a 60 second cooldown that is reduced by 1 second for every demo you slay, and 4 if killed with a bow.
With this Warhammer, your attacks cleave dealing massive damage to lesser demons. Right click to channel your Warhammer, reducing damage and slowly restoring mana and armor.
With this Dagger, you move more quickly and are resistant to knockback. This dagger also poisons enemies. Right click to Eviscerate a target dealing massive damage.

With this Shovel, you gain a Powerful Rampage for 5 seconds when shoveling gravel. Additional kills while on a rampage will allow you to extend the duration. Right Click to gain a haste buff to both dig and craft faster as well as put an additional resource item you gather into the Shared Resource Chest.
With this Fist weapon, your damage is increased the weaker your armor is. You restore mana everytime you slay a demon. Right click to Pounce forward a short distance.
With this bow, each arrow that hits a demon increases its damage by 50% for the next 30 seconds up to maximum of 150%
With this Crossbow, your arrows fire instantly and much faster than a normal bow. Can be used to move and shoot.
With this Bow, killing demons gives you a 5 second Powerful Rampage.
With this Bow, arrows that do not hit a monster will spawn an enchanted lamp that lasts seconds. You are also immune to darkness while holding wielding bow.
With this Bow, you fire bolts of pure dwarven strength. Kills with this bow grant nearby dwarves a Power Rampage for 3 seconds. This bow can also be used to repair walls.
With this Bow, switching to your weapon while an arrow is in flight causes you to teleport to the arrow after it lands then warps you back after 10 seconds have passed.
With this Juice, you will automatically use it when you drop below 75% for less than normal costs! Bruce's Special juice!
With this Ale, you gain 6 absorbtion hearts every time you drink from it.
With this Star, you gain the ability to Right Click to release a beam that heals and slowly repairs armor.
With this Trinket, you passively regenerate 3.33 health every second and gain 20 absorbtion hearts everytime you use it.
Increases the durability of your armor by 100% allowing you to last longer in combat without needing repair.
Tripples the size of your quiver, allowing you to hold more arrows. Also gives you one arrow per kill.
Randomly gain one of five different buffs every minute. Regen, Nightvision, Speed, Fire Immunity, or Resistance.
Start with 1 Scrolls of Magic Stone that can instantly create a Enchanted Wall in front of you.
Start with 3 Scrolls of Magic Stone that can instantly create a Enchanted Wall in front of you.
Start with 5 Scrolls of Magic Stone that can instantly create a Enchanted Wall in front of you.
Start with 2 enchanted lamps, which provide an unbreakable light source for 60 seconds.
Start with 5 enchanted lamps, which provide an unbreakable light source for 60 seconds.
Start with 12 enchanted lamps, which provide an unbreakable light source for 60 seconds.
Gives you 2 Wiggly Wrenches, which instantly repair your armor to full.
Gives you 4 Wiggly Wrenches, which instantly repair your armor to full.
Gives you 7 Wiggly Wrenches, which instantly repair your armor to full.
Start with 16 Wizard Mortar, which lets you make Enchanted Walls.
Start with 32 Wizard Mortar, which lets you make Enchanted Walls.
Start with 64 Wizard Mortar, which lets you make Enchanted Walls.

Start with 1 SOS.
Call down a powerful Paladin sword to purge all monsters in range with a 500 Power Attack and removing any rebirth marks.

Start with 2 SOS.
Call down a powerful Paladin sword to purge all monsters in range with a 500 Power Attack and removing any rebirth marks.

Start with 3 SOS.
Call down a powerful Paladin sword to purge all monsters in range with a 500 Power Attack and removing any rebirth marks.
Gives you a compass to point you to various places on the map.
Darkness immunity for the first 20 minutes of the game.
Anytime a Dwarf dies, gain a Powerful Rampage for 10 seconds.
